name: @cloudideaas/hydra
description: Hydra is a app generation tool with resulting source code. Generated front-end support for Ionic/Angular. Restful service layer support for .NET Core. Back-end support for SQL Server. Other supported technologies coming soon as Hydra is highly extensible.

scripts.preinstall: echo 'Downloading Hydra, this may take a while. Please wait...' & npm install -g @cloudideaas/hydrainstall
